wikipedia_page.main: David Boylen (born 26 October 1947) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder, who later became a politician.

link_mentions.page: List of Grimsby Town F.C. players

response: Former Grimsby Town player Dave Boylen held sports dinner charity events for the Artie White Foundation at the Winter Gardens since 1997, which saw the likes of Denis Law attend the venue. Other famous footballers included the likes of George Best, Sir Bobby Charlton and his brother Jack Charlton, Sir Geoff Hurst, Nobby Stiles to attend the venue.
* Dave Boylen (born 1947), English football midfielder and politician
